item.title: Show off some pockets
item.description: Let us know about a great item of clothing, a fab designer or store, or feel free to talk to us about pockets! You can also you can submit your own post if you’re feeling technical. Hey Steph, My name is and my email address is I wanted to let you know about You can find out more at this You may also find this picture handy send

item.title: Submitting a post
item.description: To submit a post directly to the site, then at the moment it requires you to be reasonably comfortable with GitHub and markdown. If that’s put you off, simply fill in this form which asks you for information and we’ll get around to penning a blog post on your behalf. Getting ready to write your post Fork this repository (stephlocke/girlswithdeeppockets) to your own GitHub account Clone this to your computer Create a new file called [SOMETHINGRELEVANT].
